name: Link Card
description:
Make Link much mor clickable 🔗


Figma’s "links to text” is nice feature for Figma as document.

But not to much clickable area.


“Link Card” makes much more clickable.


STEP:

  1. Change text to link text.
  2. Select this, execute “Link Card” plugin.
  3. Link text will be a Mini-Card 🎉
